#To view GAV loads of all families from 1 plate per pond using ggplot2
```{r}
library(tidyverse) ## Do this everytime you restart R and need it
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r}
library(readr)
allfams <- read_csv("Working Files/allcohorts_1plate_class.csv")

View(allfams)

head(allfams)
summary(allfams)
str(allfams)
```

#make sure labels are ffactors and not characters

```{r}
allfams $IntFamID <- as.factor(allfams $IntFamID)
summary(allfams)
allfams $Cohort <- as.factor(allfams$Cohort)
allfams$Code <- as.factor(allfams$Code)
```

#make sure values are numeric and not strings

```{r}
allfams$GAV <- as.numeric(allfams$GAV)

```


##Scatterplot by families
```{r}
ggplot(allfams , aes(IntFamID , GAV)) +
  geom_point() +
  theme_classic()
```

##boxplot by families
```{r}
ggplot(top10fams , aes(IntFamID , GAV)) +

top10famplot <- ggplot(top10fams , aes(IntFamID , GAV)) +
```
